title: Nova9
author: Nova9
content: Need to buy Sr Member or Up rank bitcointalk accout. Anyone want to sell Please contract me on: https://t.me/Nova9880

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Why do you need to buy a bitcointalk account? You can contribute good and let your newly created account to just rank up. It is better that way. Know that account sales can lead to scam. Also know that you can buy an account that has plagiarized before which may later be banned. Or you need an account for business reasons?

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on September 27, 2022, 07:56:18 PMOr you need an account for business reasons?Business purpose cannot be an excuse for account trading. We have copper membership and this wonderful community (for topic designing or for any similar services) which means even a newbie account can do business here comfortably; they just need patience to learn about all the opportunities here like what to do and what not to do.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Simply put OP wants a shorter route to join signature campaign or just to make an account for business, bet what? for reputation purposes. In most ways, shorter routes for easy bitcointalk ranking are deemed as making trouble to being a ringleader.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: Fraudulent reasons are the reasons that comes to my mind when anyone wants to buy an account. I don’t see any reason why a newbie account can’t transact business or publicize his skills any different than a legendary account so purchasing an account for business purposes is out of the question.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on September 27, 2022, 07:56:18 PMWhy do you need to buy a bitcointalk account? You can contribute good and let your newly created account to just rank up. It is better that way. There are 2 reasons people buy accounts here. One is they want to earn money posting, which is why he wants Sr+ because full members are rarely picked by signature managers. The other reason is they want to look more legit to run their own thread, usually scams. Like when they launch an altcoin or an NFT, they want a high rank account backing them. It really doesn't matter if the account is being bought for the first or the second reason. If we say that it's ok if they want to buy an account to make money from signatures who's to stop people from buying 4 accounts and shitposting all over the forum with them, because he won't consistently make 100 good posts a week. At least half of them will be complete garbage.
